headline: Ralph Lauren (RL): Assessing Valuation After Recent Share Price Gains and Analyst Upgrades
summary: Ralph Lauren (RL) shares have seen steady gains lately, rising 4% over the past month and an impressive 14% over the past 3 months. The company continues to deliver annual growth in both revenue and net income. See our latest analysis for Ralph Lauren. Momentum has really accelerated for Ralph Lauren, with a 43% year-to-date share price return that outpaces many in the consumer space. The one-year total shareholder return of 61% and a remarkable 368% total return over five years show both...
